TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NameValueCollection extends System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase
.class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit NameValueCollection extends System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Serializable]
[<System.Serializable>]

summary.span: 表示可通过键或索引访问的关联 键和 值的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of associated keys and values that can be accessed either with the key or with the index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此集合基于 类。This collection is based on the class. 集合中的每个元素都是一个键/值对。Each element of the collection is a key/value pair. 但是，与不同 ，此类可以在单个键下存储多个字符串值。However, unlike the , this class can store multiple string values under a single key. 此类可用于标头、查询字符串和表单数据。This class can be used for headers, query strings and form data. 此类型的集合不保留元素的顺序，枚举集合时不保证特定顺序。Collections of this type do not preserve the ordering of elements, and no particular ordering is guaranteed when enumerating the collection. 的容量 是可容纳的元素数 。The capacity of a is the number of elements the can hold. 添加元素时，其容量将根据需要通过重新分配自动增加。As elements are added, its capacity is automatically increased as required through reallocation. 哈希代码提供程序密密麻麻中的键的哈希代码 。The hash code provider dispenses hash codes for keys in the . 默认哈希代码提供程序为 。The default hash code provider is the . 比较器确定两个键是否相等。The comparer determines whether two keys are equal. 默认比较器是 使用 [固定区域性](xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture)的约定的，也就是说，默认情况下键比较不区分大小写。The default comparer is a that uses the conventions of the [invariant culture](xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture); that is, key comparisons are case-insensitive by default. 若要执行区分大小写的键比较，请调用 构造函数，并将 、 或值 作为 `equalityComparer` 参数提供。To perform case-sensitive key comparisons, call the constructor, and provide a value of , , or as the `equalityComparer` argument. 有关区域性如何影响比较和排序的详细信息，请参阅 [执行不区分区域性的字符串操作](/dotnet/standard/globalization-localization/performing-culture-insensitive-string-operations)。For more information about how culture affects comparisons and sorting, see [Performing Culture-Insensitive String Operations](/dotnet/standard/globalization-localization/performing-culture-insensitive-string-operations). `null` 允许作为键或值。`null` is allowed as a key or as a value. > [!CAUTION] > `null` 由于找不到指定的键，并且 `null` 因为与键关联的值为，因此方法不区分返回的 `null` 。The method does not distinguish between `null` which is returned because the specified key is not found and `null` which is returned because the value associated with the key is `null`. ## Examples :::code language="cpp" source="~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection2/CPP/nvc.cpp" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection2/CS/nvc.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection2/VB/nvc.vb" id="Snippet1":::

threadsafe.span: 此类型) 成员 Visual Basic 的公共静态 (是线程安全的。

span.span: Public static ( in Visual Basic) members of this type are thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 但不保证所有实例成员都是线程安全的。

span.span: Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 此实现不提供的同步 (线程安全) 包装程序 ，但派生类可以使用类的属性创建其自己的同步版本 。

span.span: This implementation does not provide a synchronized (thread safe) wrapper for a , but derived classes can create their own synchronized versions of the using the property of the class.

threadsafe.span: 枚举集合本质上不是线程安全的过程。

span.span: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.

threadsafe.span: 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。

span.span: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.

threadsafe.span: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。

span.span: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.

related.span: 执行不区分区域性的字符串操作

span.span: Performing Culture-Insensitive String Operations

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，该实例为空且具有默认初始容量，并使用不区分大小写的默认哈希代码提供程序和不区分大小写的默认比较器。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that is empty, has the default initial capacity and uses the default case-insensitive hash code provider and the default case-insensitive comparer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的容量 是可容纳的元素数 。The capacity of a is the number of elements that the can hold. 当向添加元素时 ，将根据需要通过重新分配内部数组来自动增加容量。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果集合的大小可为估算值，则指定初始容量后，无需在将元素添加到时执行多个大小调整操作 。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 哈希代码提供程序密密麻麻中的键的哈希代码 。The hash code provider dispenses hash codes for keys in the . 默认哈希代码提供程序为 。The default hash code provider is the . 比较器确定两个键是否相等。The comparer determines whether two keys are equal. 默认比较器为 。The default comparer is the . 此构造函数是一个 O (1) 操作。This constructor is an O(1) operation.

related.span: 执行不区分区域性的字符串操作

span.span: Performing Culture-Insensitive String Operations

param.span: 对象，用于确定两个键是否相等，并为集合中的键生成哈希代码。

span.span: The object to use to determine whether two keys are equal and to generate hash codes for the keys in the collection.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that is empty, has the default initial capacity, and uses the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象的容量 是可容纳的元素数 。The capacity of a object is the number of elements that the can hold. 当向添加元素时 ，将根据需要通过重新分配内部数组来自动增加容量。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果集合的大小可为估算值，则指定初始容量后，无需在将元素添加到时执行多个大小调整操作 。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 对象合并比较器与哈希代码提供程序。The object combines the comparer and the hash code provider. 哈希代码提供程序密密麻麻中的键的哈希代码 。The hash code provider dispenses hash codes for keys in the . 比较器确定两个键是否相等。The comparer determines whether two keys are equal. 此构造函数是一个 O (1) 操作。This constructor is an O(1) operation.

summary.span: 将项从指定的 复制到一个新的 ，这个新集合的初始容量与复制的项数相等，并使用与源集合相同的哈希代码提供程序和比较器。

span.span: Copies the entries from the specified to a new with the same initial capacity as the number of entries copied and using the same hash code provider and the same comparer as the source collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的容量 是可容纳的元素数 。The capacity of a is the number of elements that the can hold. 当向添加元素时 ，将根据需要通过重新分配内部数组来自动增加容量。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果集合的大小可为估算值，则指定初始容量后，无需在将元素添加到时执行多个大小调整操作 。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 哈希代码提供程序密密麻麻中的键的哈希代码 。The hash code provider dispenses hash codes for keys in the . 默认哈希代码提供程序为 。The default hash code provider is the . 比较器确定两个键是否相等。The comparer determines whether two keys are equal. 默认比较器为 。The default comparer is the . 新的元素按与 源相同的顺序进行排序 。The elements of the new are sorted in the same order as the source . 此构造函数是一个 O (`n`) 操作，其中 `n` 是中的元素数 `col` 。This constructor is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the number of elements in `col`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的容量 是可容纳的元素数 。The capacity of a is the number of elements that the can hold. 当向添加元素时 ，将根据需要通过重新分配内部数组来自动增加容量。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果集合的大小可为估算值，则指定初始容量后，无需在将元素添加到时执行多个大小调整操作 。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 哈希代码提供程序密密麻麻中的键的哈希代码 。The hash code provider dispenses hash codes for keys in the . 默认哈希代码提供程序为 。The default hash code provider is the . 比较器确定两个键是否相等。The comparer determines whether two keys are equal. 默认比较器为 。The default comparer is the . 此构造函数是一个 O (`n`) 操作，其中， `n` 为 `capacity` 。This constructor is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `capacity`. 如果中的元素数 `col` 大于 `capacity` ，则此构造函数将成为 () 操作的 O `n` + `m` ，其中， `n` 为 `capacity` ， `m` 是中的元素数 `col` 。If the number of elements in `col` is greater than `capacity`, this constructor becomes an O(`n` + `m`) operation, where `n` is `capacity` and `m` is the number of elements in `col`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过此属性，可以使用以下语法来访问集合中的特定元素：`myCollection[index]`。This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: `myCollection[index]`. 无法设置此属性。This property cannot be set. 若要设置指定索引处的值，请使用 `Item[GetKey(index)]` 。To set the value at a specified index, use `Item[GetKey(index)]`. C # 语言使用 [this](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/keywords/this) 关键字来定义索引器，而不是实现 属性。The C# language uses the [this](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/keywords/this) keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the property. Visual Basic 实现 为 [默认属性](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/default)，该属性提供相同的索引功能。Visual Basic implements as a [default property](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/default), which provides the same indexing functionality. 检索指定索引处的值是 O (`n`) 运算，其中 `n` 是值的数目。Retrieving the values at the specified index is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the number of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过此属性，可以使用以下语法来访问集合中的特定元素：`myCollection[name]`。This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: `myCollection[name]`. 如果集合中已存在指定的键，则设置此属性将用指定的值覆盖现有的值列表。If the specified key already exists in the collection, setting this property overwrites the existing list of values with the specified value. 若要将新值追加到现有值列表，请使用 方法。To append the new value to the existing list of values, use the method. 如果集合中不存在指定的键，则设置此属性将使用指定的键和指定的值创建一个新项。If the specified key does not exist in the collection, setting this property creates a new entry using the specified key and the specified value. > [!CAUTION] > `null`如果找不到指定的键，此属性将在以下情况下返回： 1) ; 如果找到指定的键，则为 2) ; 如果找到指定的值，则为 2 `null` 。This property returns `null` in the following cases: 1) if the specified key is not found; and 2) if the specified key is found and its associated value is `null`. 此属性不区分这两种情况。This property does not distinguish between the two cases. C # 语言使用 [this](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/keywords/this) 关键字来定义索引器，而不是实现 属性。The C# language uses the [this](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/keywords/this) keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the property. Visual Basic 实现 为 [默认属性](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/default)，该属性提供相同的索引功能。Visual Basic implements as a [default property](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/default), which provides the same indexing functionality. 检索或设置与指定键关联的值是 O (`n`) 操作，其中 `n` 是值的数目。Retrieving or setting the values associated with the specified key is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the number of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 不包含具有指定键的元素，则 保持不变。If the doesn't contain an element with the specified key, the remains unchanged. 不会引发异常。No exception is thrown. 如果 `null` 为参数指定值，则 `name` 会删除带有键的项 `null` （如果找到）。If you specify a `null` value to the `name` parameter, an entry with a `null` key is removed, if found. 在由连续的元素组成的集合（如列表）中，已移除元素下面的元素将上移以占据空出的位置。In collections of contiguous elements, such as lists, the elements that follow the removed element move up to occupy the vacated spot. 如果集合具有索引，则移动的元素的索引也将更新。If the collection is indexed, the indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated. 此行为不适用于元素按概念划分为不同存储桶的集合，如哈希表。This behavior does not apply to collections where elements are conceptually grouped into buckets, such as a hash table. 此方法是 O (`n`) 操作，其中 `n` 是 。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is .
